translation: He who neither rejoices nor hates, nor grieves nor desires, renouncing both good and evil, and who is full of devotion, is dear to Me.
commentary: 12.17 who who? Not not? rejoices rejoices? Not not? hates hates? Not not? Grieves grieves? Not not? desires desires? renouncing good and evil? devout full of devotion? who who? He he? Me to Me? The beloved is dear.Commentary What is described in verse 13 is dealt with at length in this.He does not rejoice when he attains the desirable objects. He doesn't hate when he gets the undesirable objects.
